sentences.en: Access to the building is by swipe card only.
sentences.cn: 这栋楼用磁卡才能进去。

sentences.en: Don't swipe at the ball carelessly, take more careful aim.
sentences.cn: 别漫不经心地击球, 瞄准一些.

sentences.en: Entry to the Centre is by swipe card only.
Genesis recorded a song which took a swipe at greedy property developers who bought up and demolished people's homes.
sentences.cn: 吉妮西丝录制了一首歌来抨击那些买下并毁坏人们家园的贪婪的房地产开发商。

sentences.en: In a swipe at the president, he called for an end to "begging for aid around the world".
sentences.cn: 在对总统含沙射影的批评中，他呼吁停止“满世界乞求援助”。

sentences.en: It was so simple: just swipe the card and sign the receipt.
sentences.cn: 用信用卡很简单: 划卡,签名.

sentences.en: She made a swipe at Herb, which he easily dodged.
sentences.cn: 她使劲打了赫伯一下, 但是他很容易地闪开了.

sentences.en: She made a swipe at the mosquito.
She swiped me across the face.
sentences.cn: 她扬起手打了我一个耳光。

sentences.en: She took a playful swipe at her brother.
sentences.cn: 她玩笑般地朝她弟弟挥手打去.

sentences.en: So, what was in the briefcase that anyone might want to swipe?
sentences.cn: 那么公文包里有什么会让人想偷的东西 吗 ?

sentences.en: Swipe your card through the phone, then dial.
sentences.cn: 在电话机上刷卡，然后拨号。

sentences.en: Swipe your MetroCard, turn the turnstile and enter through the service gate.
sentences.cn: 刷一下您的卡, 把旋转门,进入门的服务.

sentences.en: They use a swipe card to go in and out of their offices.
sentences.cn: 他们出入办公室要刷卡。

sentences.en: Users will be provided with a PIN - protected swipe card.
sentences.cn: 用户将会拿到个人识别密码受到保护的磁卡.

sentences.en: When talking about the performance, she couldn't resist ( taking ) a side - swipe at the orchestra.
sentences.cn: 她谈到演出时, 忍不住把管弦乐队批评了一通.

trans.tran_cn: 重击，尖锐的评论，柄，握杆
trans.tran_en: a criticism of someone or something
to hit or to try to hit someone or something by swinging your arm or an object very quickly
